summary: In 1920 an archaeological expedition discovers the tomb of an ancient Egyptian child prince. Returning home with their discovery, the expedition members soon find themselves being killed ... See full summary »
cast: André Morell|John Phillips|David Buck|Elizabeth Sellars|Maggie Kimberly|Michael Ripper|Tim Barrett|Richard Warner|Roger Delgado|Catherine Lacey|Dickie Owen|Bruno Barnabe|Toni Gilpin|Toolsie Persaud|Eddie Powell|Andreas Malandrinos|John Garrie|Pat Gorman|Darroll Richards|Michael Rothwell|Terence Sewards|Roy Stephens|Tim Turner|George Zenios
title: El sudario de la momia
